def_cn: (用于构成形容词，表示某种能力上的障碍)听力/视力受损的,有听力/视力障碍的
def_en: You use -impaired in adjectives where you are describing someone with a particular disability. For example, someone who is hearing-impaired has a disability affecting their hearing, and someone who is visually-impaired has a disability affecting their sight.
